basic.description:
An analysis of Canadian foreign policy, its major objectives and orientations. Topics covered include Canada's role and interests in major international organizations and its relations with key countries and regions.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: POLS
basic.title: Canadian Foreign Policy

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE  (12.0 units in POLS at the 200-level or above) and (a GPA of 2.0 on all units in POLS) or permission of the department.
